==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|ちょう|だい|yomi=on}}

===Etymology===
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=ちょうだい}} compound {{m|ltc|頂戴|tr=*děng *də̀i}}. Compare modern {{etyl|cmn|-}} traditional {{m|cmn|頂戴}} and simplified {{m|cmn|顶戴|tr=dǐngdài}}.

===Pronunciation===
* {{l|ja|sc=Latn|音読み|On'yomi}}
* {{ja-accent-common|n|ちょ|うだ|い}}<ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>
* {{IPA|lang=ja|[t͡ɕʲo̞ːda̠i]}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|ちょうだい}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=ちょうだい|humble|formal|archaic}} a [[humble]] [[submission]], a [[humble]] [[contribution]] made to someone of higher [[status]]
# {{lb|ja|sort=ちょうだい|humble|formal|archaic}} a [[humble]] [[reception]] or [[receiving]] of something
# {{lb|ja|sort=ちょうだい|informal}} to [[request]]: compare English {{m|en|please}}, {{m|en|gimme}}
#: {{ja-usex|この バラ '''ちょうだい'''。|^この バラ '''ちょうだい'''。|I''''ll have''' these roses. / '''Please give me''' these roses.}}
#: {{ja-usex|スプーン '''ちょうだい'''。|^スプーン '''ちょうだい'''。|'''Gimme''' the spoon.}}
#: {{ja-usex|ここに名前を書いて'''ちょうだい'''。|^ここ に なまえ を かいて '''ちょうだい'''。|'''Please''' write your name here.}}

====Usage notes====
When used as ''please'' or ''gimme'', this is used as a kind of command form. This [[imperative]] sense is added after the desired noun with the object particle {{ja-l|を||o}} optional, or after the {{ja-l|て||te}} or [[conjunctive]] form of the desired verb. This usage is almost always written in hiragana, and is mostly used by women and children.

The other usages are generally written in kanji.

====Synonyms====
* {{sense|please give me, for nouns}} {{ja-l|下さい|ください|kudasai}}
* {{sense|please, for verbs}} {{ja-l|下さい|ください|kudasai}} {{qualifier|after ''-te'' form of verb}}

=====Derived terms=====
* {{ja-l|頂戴物|ちょうだいもの|chōdaimono}}: a [[gift]]

===Verb===
{{ja-verb-suru|ちょうだい|tr=transitive}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=ちょうだい|humble|formal}} to [[receive]] something
#: {{ja-usex|先月は結構なものを'''頂戴'''して誠にありがとうございました。|^せんげつ は けっこう な もの を '''ちょうだい''' して まこと に ありがとう ございました。|Thank you very much for quite the gift I '''received''' [from you] last month.}}
# to [[eat]], to have a [[meal]]
#: {{ja-usex|腹一杯'''頂戴'''しました。|^はら いっぱい '''ちょうだい''' しました。|I've '''eaten''' my fill.}}
